item.title: Mini #12
item.description: And now a coriolis storm blows… heralding the onset of rain.

item.title: Mini #11
item.description: It would be great to have a stillsuit in Mumbai right now!

item.title: Mini #10
item.description: I spent 4 years at IISc, and yet, I did not know that the bronze statue of J N Tata in front of the main building holds in his hand a small replica of the main building!

item.title: Mini #9
item.description: The Gateway of India was lit in purple and pink for the promotion of Stranger Things 4. A rare glimpse.

item.title: Mini #8
item.description:
I stumbled into a beautiful bookstore called Kitab Khana in Fort. I bought six books, including a Gujarati book and a Marathi book. I hope I get better at these languages after reading these books.

There’s also a book on linguistic puzzles. It looks like these would be fun to solve.

item.title: Mini #7
item.description: I went to a book fair and bought a bunch of books. The books were sold by weight at â‚¹300/kg, so I got them at a real bargain. 📚

item.title: Mini #6
item.description: I had A Dream of Spring in which The Winds of Winter arrived.

item.title: Mini #5
item.description: Good news, everyone! Futurama will return with 20 new episodes in 2023!

item.title: Mini #4
item.description:
I foolishly tried to fight the guy near the bonfire in Lordran and he killed me almost immediately.

I respawned, and he was still trying to kill me. I jumped off a cliff, and so did he. I respawned, but he did not :)

item.title: Mini #3
item.description:
I started playing Dark Souls today. It is not as hard as I expected but, then again, I have only completed the tutorial.

One of the best tutorials I have seen in a game, despite being jump scared by a rolling boulder.

item.title: Mini #2
item.description: So excited for season 3 of What We Do in the Shadows! Starting September 2. 🧛‍♂️ 🧛‍♀️ 🧛‍♂️ 👨‍🦲 🦇

item.title: Mini #1
item.description: My first mini post! Inspired by micro.blog.
